forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. ENE winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with occasional rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 52F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. E winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. ESE winds shifting to N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
